file.name: Search_Studies_SearchResultsDbId_GET.yaml
file.content:
info: title: BrAPI version: '' openapi: 3.0.0 paths: /search/studies/{searchResultsDbId}: get: summary: Get the results of a `Studies` search request description: |- Get the results of a `Studies` search request
Clients should submit a search request using the corresponding `POST /search/studies` endpoint. Search requests allow a client to send a complex query for data. However, the server may not respond with the search results immediately. If a server needs more time to process the request, it might respond with a `searchResultsDbId`. Use this endpoint to retrieve the results of the search.
Review the Search Services documentation for additional implementation details. parameters: - $ref: '#/components/parameters/searchResultsDbId' - $ref: '#/components/parameters/page' - $ref: '#/components/parameters/pageSize' - $ref: '#/components/parameters/authorizationHeader' responses: '202': $ref: '#/components/responses/202AcceptedSearchResponse' '200': $ref: '#/components/responses/StudyListResponse' '400': $ref: '#/components/responses/400BadRequest' '401': $ref: '#/components/responses/401Unauthorized' '403': $ref: '#/components/responses/403Forbidden' '404': $ref: '#/components/responses/404NotFound' tags: - Studies
